PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15492017-12-11,  ,  ,  INAC, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of CLINTON DAVIS of Toronto, Ontario as a special adviser to the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development, to serve as a Member of the Interim Board for the establishment of the National Council for Reconciliation, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term of six months, effective December 11, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
